testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester" as first and last names.passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "testtt@example.com" field.............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssworddd" as password and confirmation password.passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "testtt@example.com" and "P@ssworddd" as email and password.passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssworddd" as email and password.passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | The Euro symbol appears beside the price when Euro is selected from currencies list
testcase.name: Euro could be selected form currencies list
testcase.system-out: When select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then verify Euro Symbol (€) is shown on the four products displayed in Home page.passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name - Example #1.1

failure.message: The following asserts failed: parameter (1) does not has book expected [true] but found [false], parameter (5) does not has book expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: parameter (1) does not has book expected [true] but found [false], parameter (5) does not has book expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D04_searchStepDef.verifyThatTheSearchPageIsOpenedAndResultContainsTheSearchWord(D04_searchStepDef.java:34) at ✽.verify that the search page is opened and result contains the "book" word(file:///D:/courses/software_testing/EGFWD/6-Automation/Selenium_Web_Driver/Final%20Project/E_Commerce_Automation/src/main/resources/features/F04_Search.feature:6)
testcase.system-out: When user enter "book" as search parameter..................................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed Then verify that the search page is opened and result contains the "book" word.failed

testcase.name: user could search using product name - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: When user enter "laptop" as search parameter................................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed Then verify that the search page is opened and result contains the "laptop" word.passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: When user enter "nike" as search parameter..................................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed Then verify that the search page is opened and result contains the "nike" word.passed

testcase.name: user could search using sku - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: When user enter "SCI_FAITH" as search parameter.............................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed And user clicks on the product in search page...............................passed Then verify that the sku in the product page is the same "SCI_FAITH" you entered.passed

testcase.system-out: When user enter "APPLE_CAM" as search parameter.............................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed And user clicks on the product in search page...............................passed Then verify that the sku in the product page is the same "APPLE_CAM" you entered.passed

testcase.system-out: When user enter "SF_PRO_11" as search parameter.............................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed And user clicks on the product in search page...............................passed Then verify that the sku in the product page is the same "SF_PRO_11" you entered.passed

testcase.name: user could click on heart button to add product to the wishlist

testcase.name: user could see the added products in the wishlist
